attendance.note_use_sheet_name: 1. Please use sheet name as "Attendance Data" while uploading.
attendance.note_use_correct_format: 2. Use proper Employee Code and Date/Time format as shown below.
attendance.note_no_column_change: 3. Do not alter column headers in the attendance sheet.
attendance.note_fill_and_upload: 5. You can fill data in the same Excel under the sheet named 'Attendance Data' and upload it.
attendance.sheet_not_found: Sheet named 'Attendance Data' not found. Please use the correct template.
attendance.excel_empty_or_invalid: Excel file is empty or invalid.
attendance.invalid_headers: Invalid headers in Excel file. Please use the correct template.
attendance.upload_failed: Failed to upload Excel file. Please try again.
attendance.invalid_file_type: Invalid file type. Please upload a valid Excel file (.xlsx or .xls).
attendance.at_errorLabelInvalid: Label cannot be just spaces, numbers or any special characters.
attendance.at_errorLabelDuplicate: Label already exists! Please enter a different label.
attendance.at_attendanceMode: Please select the mode of capturing attendance
attendance.at_minimumHoursPerWeek: No. of minimum hours required per Week
attendance.at_errorMinimumHours: Minimum Hours per Week is required.
attendance.at_notifyEmployeeMinHours: Do you want to notify employee if Min Hours not accomplished?
attendance.at_errorNotifyEmployeeMinHours: Notify Employee minimum hour is required.
attendance.at_weeklyOffDays: Which days should be considered as weekly off?
attendance.at_errorWeeklyOffDays: At least one day must be selected as Weekly Off.
attendance.at_weeklyOffHalfDay: Which week off is a half day?
attendance.at_errorAlternateWeekOffRoutine: Alternative Week off Routine is required.
attendance.at_daysForAlternateWeekOffRoutine: Days for alternate week off routine
attendance.at_errorDaysForAlternateWeekOffRoutine: At least one day must be selected.
attendance.at_notifySupervisors: Do you want to send notification to supervisors?
attendance.at_approvalLevel: How many levels of approvals you want to add?
attendance.at_errorRequiredFields: Please fill out the Required Fields to Proceed!
attendance.ata_employee_already_assigned: The selected employee already has an assigned attendance template!
